plot: A warehouse workman, tricked into thinking he is the heir to millions, locates an American financier to win his boss's daughter.
title: Wait and See
plot_es: A warehouse workman, tricked into thinking he is the heir to millions, locates an American financier to win his boss's daughter.
plot_en: A warehouse workman, tricked into thinking he is the heir to millions, locates an American financier to win his boss's daughter.
